or ‘C’ or ‘ceph’ 
(cephalic). Both words mean the top of the head. 
If your baby stays with its bottom downwards, this 
is a breech (‘Br’) 
presentation. 
‘PP’ means 
presenting 
part, which is 
the part (head 
or bottom) of 
your baby that 
is	coming	first.	
‘Tr’ (transverse) 
means your baby is lying across your abdomen. 
Position. Height of the uterus and the position 
of the baby in the womb.
* ROA: Right occipito anterior
LOP: Left occipito posterior
Fetal	heart	(FH). ‘FHH’ or just ‘H’ mean
